mapper.sql: id, addtime, goodsname, classid, brandid, sellprice, originalprice, Inventory, salevolume, clicks, state, path, volume, weight, goodsnumber, recommend
mapper.select:
select goods.id as id, goods.addtime, goods.goodsname, goods.classid, goods.brandid, goods.sellprice, goods.originalprice, goods.Inventory, goods.salevolume, goods.clicks, goods.state, goods.path, goods.volume, goods.weight, goods.goodsnumber, goods.recommend ,goods.details, classes.classname as classname from tb_goods goods left join tb_classes classes on classes.id=goods.classid where goods.state ="上架"
and goods.goodsname like '%${goodsname}%'
and goods.classid in
#{item}

select goods.id as id, goods.addtime, goods.goodsname, goods.classid, goods.brandid, goods.sellprice, goods.originalprice, goods.Inventory, goods.salevolume, goods.clicks, goods.state, goods.path, goods.volume, goods.weight, goods.goodsnumber, goods.recommend ,goods.details, brand.brandname as brandname, classes.classname as classname from tb_goods goods left join tb_brand brand on brand.id=goods.brandid left join tb_classes classes on classes.id=goods.classid order by goods.addtime desc

select
,
from tb_goods where recommend = #{recommend} order by rand() limit 5

select
,
from tb_goods order by addtime desc limit 5

select
,
from tb_goods order by inventory desc limit 5
mapper.insert: insert into tb_goods (id, addtime, goodsname, classid, brandid, sellprice, originalprice, Inventory, salevolume, clicks, state, path, volume, weight, goodsnumber, recommend, details) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{classid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{brandid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sellprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{originalprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{inventory,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{salevolume,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{clicks,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{volume,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{goodsnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recommend,jdbcType=BIT}, #{details,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update tb_goods
addtime = #{addtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
goodsname = #{goodsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
classid = #{classid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
brandid = #{brandid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sellprice = #{sellprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
originalprice = #{originalprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
Inventory = #{inventory,jdbcType=INTEGER},
salevolume = #{salevolume,jdbcType=INTEGER},
clicks = #{clicks,jdbcType=INTEGER},
state = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
path = #{path,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
volume = #{volume,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
weight = #{weight,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
goodsnumber = #{goodsnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recommend = #{recommend,jdbcType=BIT},
details = #{details,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
